name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: mapreduce.task.skip.start.attempts
description:
The number of Task attempts AFTER which skip mode
    will be kicked off. When skip mode is kicked off, the
    tasks reports the range of records which it will process
    next, to the MR ApplicationMaster. So that on failures, the MR AM
    knows which ones are possibly the bad records. On further executions,
    those are skipped.

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.lockfree
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    LOCKFREE phase which do not involve holding a lock.
    See org.apache.hadoop.ipc.ProcessingDetails.Timing for more details on
    this phase. This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threshold.millis
description:
Configure 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. This is the number of milliseconds
    to wait before starting up a 'hedged' read.

name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.retry.interval
description:
The number of milliseconds the submitter of the job wants to
    wait before job end notification is retried if it fails. This is capped by
    mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.retry.interval

name: ipc.[port_number].scheduler.priority.levels
description:
How many priority levels to use within the scheduler and call
    queue. This property applies to RpcScheduler and CallQueue.
